name: Linear Drift - Sling Drift
description:
By clicking on the car to control drift, the ultimate experience!

[Endless ranking model]
Endless challenges, the speed will be faster and faster, the final score to participate in global player rankings. Endless mode can collect diamonds, diamonds can unlock a variety of cool cars.

[Level Challenge Mode]
100 challenging levels are waiting for you to challenge and unlock various cool cars after successfully challenging the level.
